name: VR PingPong Sweetie
description:
With the development of science and technology, intelligent AI is becoming more and more popular, and there are intelligent AI in all walks of life.
This is a training game for Ping-pong lovers, using the game features of VR to allow players to ignore the training ground and space.
We have prepared a variety of difficulties to meet the needs of fans of different levels to play.

You only need to win more balls than the sparring robot arm within the specified time to win.

game instructions:

Hit the ball by swinging the right handle
